job_details.Functieomschrijving:
To support and create Support our existing cloud platforms and deploy new ones. We value a proactive attitude with great curiosity to explore new potential solutions. You will Guide, design and deploy cloud solutions for internal and external use Identify and drive improvement initiatives such as developing new tools, new applications, more efficient solutions, develop dashboards and other creative visualizations. Support existing and develop new Shiny-based or PowerBI interactive tools for internal and external use Critique our existing modelling workflows and implement standard ML pipelines in R To innovate and guide Lead and support our team as well as industry teams by creating new solutions that create value for our clients. Improve existing and develop new ML applications, including the use of DL models Explore the business potential of novel models and methods, including but not limited to LLMs and other transformer-based models Support on live client projects with data analysis
   and insight delivery
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

To support and create Support our existing cloud platforms and deploy new ones. We value a proactive attitude with great curiosity to explore new potential solutions. You will Guide, design and deploy cloud solutions for internal and external use Identify and drive improvement initiatives such as developing new tools, new applications, more efficient solutions, develop dashboards and other creative visualizations. Support existing and develop new Shiny-based or PowerBI interactive tools for internal and external use Critique our existing modelling workflows and implement standard ML pipelines in R To innovate and guide Lead and support our team as well as industry teams by creating new solutions that create value for our clients. Improve existing and develop new ML applications, including the use of DL models Explore the business potential of novel models and methods, including but not limited to LLMs and other transformer-based models Support on live client projects with data analysis
   and insight delivery

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and deploying cloud platforms, improving existing modeling workflows, implementing standard ML pipelines, and developing new ML applications including DL models. While LLMs are mentioned, the core focus remains on traditional ML engineering tasks and productionizing models within cloud environments.

phrases.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on understanding client needs and delivering solutions that meet business objectives.

phrases.phrase: Explore the business potential of novel models and methods
phrases.justification: This highlights the need to understand how new technologies can be applied to solve business problems.

phrases.phrase: Support our existing cloud platforms and deploy new ones
phrases.justification: While broad, supporting and deploying cloud platforms often involves managing data infrastructure and pipelines.

phrases.phrase: develop dashboards and other creative visualizations
phrases.justification: Creating visualizations often requires data preparation and transformation, which falls under data engineering.

phrases.phrase: Support on live client projects with data analysis
phrases.justification: Data analysis often requires data cleaning, transformation, and preparation, which are core data engineering activities.

phrases.phrase: Critique our existing modelling workflows and implement standard ML pipelines in R
phrases.justification: This directly refers to evaluating and building machine learning models and pipelines.

phrases.phrase: develop new ML applications, including the use of DL models
phrases.justification: This explicitly mentions the development of machine learning and deep learning models.

phrases.phrase: Explore the business potential of novel models and methods, including but not limited to LLMs and other transformer-based models
phrases.justification: This indicates research and application of various modeling techniques, including generative models.
Deploying cloud solutions implies building and integrating software components.

phrases.phrase: developing new tools, new applications, more efficient solutions
phrases.justification: This points to the creation of software applications and tools.

phrases.phrase: develop dashboards and other creative visualizations
phrases.justification: Developing interactive tools and visualizations involves software development.

phrases.phrase: Support existing and develop new Shiny-based or PowerBI interactive tools
phrases.justification: Building interactive tools using specific frameworks falls under software development.

phrases.phrase: Improve existing and develop new ML applications
phrases.justification: Developing applications that incorporate ML models is a software development task.

phrases.phrase: Support our existing cloud platforms and deploy new ones
phrases.justification: Deploying and maintaining cloud platforms is a core aspect of MLOps.
Implementing pipelines for ML models is a key MLOps activity.
Supporting live projects often involves monitoring and maintaining deployed models and systems.

soft_skills.skill_name: great curiosity to explore new potential solutions
Guide, design and deploy cloud solutions
creating new solutions that create value for our clients
Explore the business potential of novel models and methods
Support on live client projects with data analysis and insight delivery
